`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function addTodo(text) {
  return {
    type: ADD_TODO,
    text,
  };
}
//Redux \u4E2D\u53EA\u9700\u628A action \u521B\u5EFA\u51FD\u6570\u7684\u7ED3\u679C\u4F20\u7ED9 dispatch() \u65B9\u6CD5\u5373\u53EF\u53D1\u8D77\u4E00\u6B21 dispatch \u8FC7\u7A0B\u3002
dispatch(addTodo(text));
//\u6216\u8005\u521B\u5EFA\u4E00\u4E2A \u88AB\u7ED1\u5B9A\u7684 action \u521B\u5EFA\u51FD\u6570 \u6765\u81EA\u52A8 dispatch\uFF1A
const boundAddTodo = (text) => dispatch(addTodo(text));
boundAddTodo(text);

  }

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.h4,{id:"middleware",children:[(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.a,{className:"header-anchor",href:"#middleware",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.span,{className:"icon icon-link"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/heavenmei/Desktop/heavenmei.io/content/note/fontFramework/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-ff90c9c3-3549-48bf-80ed-5e0586aee20a.mdx"},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/heavenmei/Desktop/heavenmei.io/content/note/fontFramework/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-ff90c9c3-3549-48bf-80ed-5e0586aee20a.mdx"},this),"Middleware"]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/heavenmei/Desktop/heavenmei.io/content/note/fontFramework/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-ff90c9c3-3549-48bf-80ed-5e0586aee20a.mdx",lineNumber:344,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`//\u65B9\u6CD5\u4E00
function logger(store) {
  // \u8FD9\u91CC\u7684 next \u5FC5\u987B\u6307\u5411\u524D\u4E00\u4E2A middleware \u8FD4\u56DE\u7684\u51FD\u6570\uFF1A
  let next = store.dispatch;

  return function dispatchAndLog(action) {
    console.log("dispatching", action);
    let result = next(action);
    console.log("next state", store.getState());
    return result;
  };
}

//\u65B9\u6CD5\u4E8C
function logger(store) {
  return function wrapDispatchToAddLogging(next) {
    return function dispatchAndLog(action) {
      console.log("dispatching", action);
      let result = next(action);
      console.log("next state", store.getState());
      return result;
    };
  };
}

//\u65B9\u6CD5\u4E8C\u2014\u2014\u67EF\u897F\u91CC\u5316
const logger = (store) => (next) => (action) => {
  console.log("dispatching", action);
  let result = next(action);
  console.log("next state", store.getState());
  return result;
};

//\u624B\u5199 \u5408\u5E76
function applyMiddleware(store, middlewares) {
  middlewares = middlewares.slice();
  middlewares.reverse();

  let dispatch = store.dispatch;
  middlewares.forEach((middleware) => (dispatch = middleware(store)(dispatch)));

  return Object.assign({}, store, { dispatch });
}

// Redux \u4E2D\u7684\u7528\u6CD5
//applyMiddleware\u4E0E\u4E0A\u8FF0\u5B9E\u73B0\u7565\u6709\u4E0D\u540C
import { createStore, combineReducers, applyMiddleware } from "redux";

let todoApp = combineReducers(reducers);
let store = createStore(
  todoApp,
  // applyMiddleware() \u544A\u8BC9 createStore() \u5982\u4F55\u5904\u7406\u4E2D\u95F4\u4EF6
  applyMiddleware(logger, crashReporter)
);

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import React from "react";
import { render } from "react-dom";
import { Provider } from "react-redux";
import { createStore } from "redux";
import reducers from "./reducers";

let store = createStore(reducers);

render(
  <Provider store={store}>
    <App />
  </Provider>,
  document.getElementById("root")
);

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`const getVisibleTodos = (todos, filter) => {
  switch (filter) {
    case "SHOW_COMPLETED":
      return todos.filter((t) => t.completed);
    case "SHOW_ACTIVE":
      return todos.filter((t) => !t.completed);
    case "SHOW_ALL":
    default:
      return todos;
  }
};

//state \u662Fstore\u7684state
//\u8FD4\u56DE\u4E00\u4E2A\u65B0\u7684\u5BF9\u8C61\uFF0C\u8FD9\u4E2A\u5BF9\u8C61\u4F1A\u4F5C\u4E3Aprops\u7684\u4E00\u90E8\u5206\u4F20\u5165ui\u7EC4\u4EF6
const mapStateToProps = (state) => {
  return {
    todos: getVisibleTodos(state.todos, state.visibilityFilter),
  };
};
const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => {
  return {
    onTodoClick: (id) => {
      dispatch(toggleTodo(id));
    },
  };
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import { create } from "zustand";

type GlobalStore = {
  bears: number,

  increasePopulation: (payload: boolean) => void,
  removeAllBears: (payload: any) => void,
  updateBears: (payload: number) => void,
};

export const useStore =
  create <
  GlobalStore >
  ((set) => ({
    bears: 0,
    increasePopulation: () => set((state) => ({ bears: state.bears + 1 })),
    removeAllBears: () => set({ bears: 0 }),
    updateBears: (newBears) => set({ bears: newBears }),
  }));
